# Lokeshwar's Portfolio

Personal portfolio built with Next.js to showcase full-stack projects, technical expertise, and real-world experience.

## ðŸš€ Features

- Built using Next.js App Router for performance and SEO
- AI-powered pre-interview assistant (Vercel AI SDK + Gemini Flash)
- Smooth animations with Framer Motion
- Modern UI using Tailwind CSS
- Dynamic project showcase with live links and repository access
